formula.name: ToVariant
formula.description: Returns the variant representation of the value. The value can be of type int, long, double, float, boolean, date and char etc

formula.name: ToDataObject
formula.description: Converts Variant to DataObject. Applicable only if the variant was created from DataObject.

formula.name: ToSection
formula.description: Converts Variant to Section. Applicable only if the variant was created from Section.

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Returns the string representation of the primitive value. The primitive can be of type int, long, double, float, boolean, date and char

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Returns the string representation of the floating point type (double, float, BigDecimal, ScaledDecimal) with specified constraints.
formula.signature: ToText(floatingType, numberDigits, decimalDigits, paddingChar, decimalPoint, sign)

formula.name: ToText
formula.description: Returns the string representation of the floating point type (double, float, BigDecimal, ScaledDecimal) with specified constraints.
formula.signature: ToText(floatingType, minNumberDigits, maxNumberDigits, minDecimalDigits, maxDecimalDigits, paddingChar, decimalPoint, sign)

formula.name: ToInt
formula.description: Returns the integer representation of the given string. If the string is not parsable to an integer value, this function throws an exception.

formula.name: ToLong
formula.description: Returns the long representation of the given string. If the string is not parsable to an long value, this function generates and propagates an exception.

formula.name: ToDouble
formula.description: Returns the double representation of the given string. If the string is not parsable to a double value, this function generates and propagates an error to the client.

formula.name: ToFloat
formula.description: Returns the float representation of the given string. If the string is not parsable to a float value, this function generates and propagates an error to the client.

formula.name: ToChar
formula.description: Returns the character representation of the given string. If the length of the string is greater than 1, the first character of the string is returned.

formula.name: ToBoolean
formula.description: Returns the boolean representation of the given string (true/false). It returns true if the string argument is is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true"

formula.name: FormatDate
formula.description: This function formats the given date based on the given pattern and returns the resultant string. When the pattern is not specified, the return string will be of form "Jan 25, 2002".

formula.name: FormatISODate
formula.description: This function formats the given ISO date based on the given pattern and returns the resultant string. When the pattern is not specified, the return string will be of form "2006-01-11T15:32:50.374+05:30".

formula.name: ParseDate
formula.description: Returns the equivalent Date object for the given date string. The date string is converted to a Date object based on the given pattern. If the pattern is not specified, then the date string should be in the form "Jan 25, 2002".

formula.name: ParseISODate
formula.description: Returns the equivalent ISO date object for the given date string. The date string is converted to ISO date object based on the given pattern. The pattern should at least contain the day, month and year to get proper results. The pattern should match the given date string exactly.
